name: MALFORMER (still in alpha, don't ask)
description:
Ah, yes. Platformers. Somehow, the biggest pain I've had for a while.

MALFORMER is a game with a simple concept: get to the goal. Or is it? There are too many glitches to be sure...

Anyway, possible hints aside, I have worked on this for around...

*checks notes*

...a day. And I've kept it open while doing other stuff. So it's going to be horrible. Very much in alpha. Keep in mind, this is the first actual game that I've worked on.

That's all I have to say.

...for now...

Just kidding.

...unless..?

*snorts* I could do this all day.

Forgot to mention, I yoinked music from filmmusic.io. Very cool stuff, Kevin.

(please don't sue me)
